blocks.name: fgmin
blocks.content: Minimality property of a generated filter: every filter that contains ` B ` contains its generated filter. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 5-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fgmin(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wb(wss(c0, c2), wss(co(c1, cfg, c0), c2)))
} = {
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wss(c0, c2), wss(co(c1, cfg, c0), c2))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wss(c0, c2), wss(co(c1, cfg, c0), c2))
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c1, cfg, c0), c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wss(c0, c2)))
  sylbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wss(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfg, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wss(c0, c2), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfg, c0)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfg, c0)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))))
  elfg(hs1, c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  impd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wss(c0, c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  com23(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wss(c0, c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  syld(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wss(c0, c2)), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wi(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wss(c0, c2), wi(wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))
  ssrexv(hs1, c0, c2, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2), wi(wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wi(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  rexlimdv(hs1, c2, wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wi(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  com34(wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  3exp2(wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  filss(c2, c1, cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wi(wss(co(c1, cfg, c0), c2), wss(c0, c2)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wi(wss(co(c1, cfg, c0), c2), wss(c0, c2)), wss(c0, co(c1, cfg, c0)))
  ssfg(c0, c1)
  sstr2(c0, co(c1, cfg, c0), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cfg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wss(c0, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  diff.hs1.w(wi(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fgmin(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(fBas ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Fil ` c1))→(c0 ⊆ c2 ↔(c1[filGen]c0)⊆ c2))
} = {
  impbid((c0 ∈(fBas ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Fil ` c1)), c0 ⊆ c2, (c1[filGen]c0)⊆ c2)
  ex((c0 ∈(fBas ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Fil ` c1)), c0 ⊆ c2, (c1[filGen]c0)⊆ c2)
  ssrdv(hs0, (c1[filGen]c0), c2, ((c0 ∈(fBas ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Fil ` c1))∧ c0 ⊆ c2))
  sylbid(((c0 ∈(fBas ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Fil ` c1))∧ c0 ⊆ c2), hs0 ∈(c1[filGen]c0), hs0 ∈ c2, (hs0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1 ⊆ hs0)))
  adantr((c0 ∈(fBas ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Fil ` c1)), c0 ⊆ c2, (hs0 ∈(c1[filGen]c0)↔(hs0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1 ⊆ hs0))))
  adantr(c0 ∈(fBas ` c1), c2 ∈(Fil ` c1), (hs0 ∈(c1[filGen]c0)↔(hs0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1 ⊆ hs0))))
  elfg(hs1, c0, c1, hs0)
  impd(((c0 ∈(fBas ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Fil ` c1))∧ c0 ⊆ c2), hs0 ⊆ c1, ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1 ⊆ hs0), hs0 ∈ c2)
  com23(((c0 ∈(fBas ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Fil ` c1))∧ c0 ⊆ c2), hs0 ⊆ c1, ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1 ⊆ hs0), hs0 ∈ c2)
  syld(((c0 ∈(fBas ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Fil ` c1))∧ c0 ⊆ c2), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1 ⊆ hs0), (hs0 ⊆ c1 → hs0 ∈ c2), ∃(hs1 ∈ c2, hs1 ⊆ hs0))
  adantl((c0 ∈(fBas ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Fil ` c1)), c0 ⊆ c2, (∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1 ⊆ hs0)→ ∃(hs1 ∈ c2, hs1 ⊆ hs0)))
  ssrexv(hs1, c0, c2, hs1 ⊆ hs0)
  ad2antlr(c0 ∈(fBas ` c1), c2 ∈(Fil ` c1), c0 ⊆ c2, (∃(hs1 ∈ c2, hs1 ⊆ hs0)→(hs0 ⊆ c1 → hs0 ∈ c2)))
  rexlimdv(hs1, c2, c2 ∈(Fil ` c1), hs1 ⊆ hs0, (hs0 ⊆ c1 → hs0 ∈ c2))
  com34(c2 ∈(Fil ` c1), hs1 ∈ c2, hs1 ⊆ hs0, hs0 ⊆ c1, hs0 ∈ c2)
  3exp2(c2 ∈(Fil ` c1), hs1 ∈ c2, hs0 ⊆ c1, hs1 ⊆ hs0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  filss(c2, c1, hs1, hs0)
  adantr(c0 ∈(fBas ` c1), c2 ∈(Fil ` c1), ((c1[filGen]c0)⊆ c2 → c0 ⊆ c2))
  syl(c0 ∈(fBas ` c1), ((c1[filGen]c0)⊆ c2 → c0 ⊆ c2), c0 ⊆(c1[filGen]c0))
  ssfg(c0, c1)
  sstr2(c0, (c1[filGen]c0), c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c1[filGen]c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ∈(fBas ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Fil ` c1))∧ c0 ⊆ c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(c2 ∈(Fil ` c1))
  diff.hs1.w((hs0 ⊆ c1 → hs0 ∈ c2))
}

blocks.name: neifg
blocks.content: The neighborhood filter of a nonempty set is generated by its open supersets. See comments for ~ opnfbas . (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 3-Sep-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm neifg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wne(c1, emptycls)), wceq(co(c2, cfg, crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0)))), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c2, cfg, crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0)))), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1), crab(hs0, cpw(c2), wne(cin(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls)), w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wne(c1, emptycls)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wne(c1, emptycls)), wceq(co(c2, cfg, crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0)))), crab(hs0, cpw(c2), wne(cin(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls))), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cfv(cfbas, c2)))
  opnfbas(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  fgval(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), c2)
  eqrdv(hs1, crab(hs0, cpw(c2), wne(cin(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls)), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1), w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wne(c1, emptycls)))
  syl5bb(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wne(c1, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs1), crab(hs0, cpw(c2), wne(cin(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(c2)), wne(cin(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs1))), emptycls)))
  elrab(hs0, cv(hs1), cpw(c2), wne(cin(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), wne(cin(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs1))), emptycls))
  neeq1d(cin(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls, cin(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  ineq2d(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs0)), cpw(cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  pweq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  bitrd(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wne(c1, emptycls)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(c2)), wne(cin(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs1))), emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wa(wss(cv(hs1), c2), wex(hs2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wss(c1, cv(hs2))), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))))))
  anbi12d(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wne(c1, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(c2)), wne(cin(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs1))), emptycls), wss(cv(hs1), c2), wex(hs2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wss(c1, cv(hs2))), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wne(c1, emptycls)), wb(wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(c2)), wss(cv(hs1), c2)))
  selpw(hs1, c2)
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wne(c1, emptycls)), wb(wne(cin(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs1))), emptycls), wex(hs2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wss(c1, cv(hs2))), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))))))
  bitri(wne(cin(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs1))), emptycls), wex(hs2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wss(c1, cv(hs2))), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wex(hs2, wcel(cv(hs2), cin(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs1))))))
  n0(hs2, cin(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs1))))
  exbii(hs2, wcel(cv(hs2), cin(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs1)))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wss(c1, cv(hs2))), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))))
  bitri(wcel(cv(hs2), cin(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs1)))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wss(c1, cv(hs2))), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs2), cpw(cv(hs1)))))
  elin(cv(hs2), crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs1)))
  anbi12i(wcel(cv(hs2), crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs2), cpw(cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wss(c1, cv(hs2))), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))
  elrab(s0, cv(hs2), c0, wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(c1, cv(hs2)))
  sseq2(cv(s0), cv(hs2), c1)
  selpw(hs2, cv(hs1))
  syl6rbbr(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wne(c1, emptycls)), wa(wss(cv(hs1), c2), wex(hs2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wss(c1, cv(hs2))), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wa(wss(cv(hs1), c2), wrex(hs2, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs2)), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))))))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wne(c1, emptycls), wb(wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wa(wss(cv(hs1), c2), wrex(hs2, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs2)), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))))))
  isnei(hs2, c0, c1, c2, cv(hs1))
  anbi2i(wss(cv(hs1), c2), wex(hs2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wss(c1, cv(hs2))), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wrex(hs2, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs2)), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))))
  bitr4i(wex(hs2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wss(c1, cv(hs2))), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wrex(hs2, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs2)), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wex(hs2, wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wa(wss(c1, cv(hs2)), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))))))
  exbii(hs2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wss(c1, cv(hs2))), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wa(wss(c1, cv(hs2)), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))))
  anass(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wss(c1, cv(hs2)), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))
  df-rex(hs2, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs2)), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(hs0, cpw(c2), wne(cin(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls)))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1))
  diff.hs1.w(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wne(c1, emptycls)))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wne(cin(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs1))), emptycls))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(cin(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))), cpw(cv(hs1))))
  diff.wss.s(s0, c1, cv(hs2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm neifg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅)→(c2[filGen]{ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 })=((nei ` c0)` c1))
  ⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd((c2[filGen]{ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 }), ((nei ` c0)` c1), { hs0 ∈ P(c2)|({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ⋂ P(hs0))≠ ∅ }, (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅))
  syl((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅), (c2[filGen]{ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 })= { hs0 ∈ P(c2)|({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ⋂ P(hs0))≠ ∅ }, { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ∈(fBas ` c2))
  opnfbas(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  fgval(hs0, { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 }, c2)
  eqrdv(hs1, { hs0 ∈ P(c2)|({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ⋂ P(hs0))≠ ∅ }, ((nei ` c0)` c1), (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅))
  syl5bb((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅), hs1 ∈ { hs0 ∈ P(c2)|({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ⋂ P(hs0))≠ ∅ }, hs1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1), (hs1 ∈ P(c2)∧({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ⋂ P(hs1))≠ ∅))
  elrab(hs0, hs1, P(c2), ({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ⋂ P(hs0))≠ ∅, ({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ⋂ P(hs1))≠ ∅)
  neeq1d(({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ⋂ P(hs0)), emptycls, ({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ⋂ P(hs1)), hs0 = hs1)
  ineq2d({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 }, P(hs0), P(hs1), hs0 = hs1)
  pweq(hs0, hs1)
  bitrd((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅), (hs1 ∈ P(c2)∧({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ⋂ P(hs1))≠ ∅), hs1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1), (hs1 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∃(hs2,((hs2 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ⊆ hs2)∧ hs2 ⊆ hs1))))
  anbi12d((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅), hs1 ∈ P(c2), ({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ⋂ P(hs1))≠ ∅, hs1 ⊆ c2, ∃(hs2,((hs2 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ⊆ hs2)∧ hs2 ⊆ hs1)))
  a1i((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅), (hs1 ∈ P(c2)↔ hs1 ⊆ c2))
  selpw(hs1, c2)
  a1i((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅), (({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ⋂ P(hs1))≠ ∅ ↔ ∃(hs2,((hs2 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ⊆ hs2)∧ hs2 ⊆ hs1))))
  bitri(({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ⋂ P(hs1))≠ ∅, ∃(hs2,((hs2 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ⊆ hs2)∧ hs2 ⊆ hs1)), ∃(hs2, hs2 ∈({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ⋂ P(hs1))))
  n0(hs2, ({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ⋂ P(hs1)))
  exbii(hs2, hs2 ∈({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ⋂ P(hs1)), ((hs2 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ⊆ hs2)∧ hs2 ⊆ hs1))
  bitri(hs2 ∈({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ⋂ P(hs1)), ((hs2 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ⊆ hs2)∧ hs2 ⊆ hs1), (hs2 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ∧ hs2 ∈ P(hs1)))
  elin(hs2, { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 }, P(hs1))
  anbi12i(hs2 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 }, hs2 ∈ P(hs1), (hs2 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ⊆ hs2), hs2 ⊆ hs1)
  elrab(s0, hs2, c0, c1 ⊆ s0, c1 ⊆ hs2)
  sseq2(s0, hs2, c1)
  selpw(hs2, hs1)
  syl6rbbr((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅), (hs1 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∃(hs2,((hs2 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ⊆ hs2)∧ hs2 ⊆ hs1))), hs1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1), (hs1 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∃(hs2 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ hs2 ∧ hs2 ⊆ hs1))))
  3adant3(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c2, c1 ≠ ∅, (hs1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1)↔(hs1 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∃(hs2 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ hs2 ∧ hs2 ⊆ hs1)))))
  isnei(hs2, c0, c1, c2, hs1)
  anbi2i(hs1 ⊆ c2, ∃(hs2,((hs2 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ⊆ hs2)∧ hs2 ⊆ hs1)), ∃(hs2 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ hs2 ∧ hs2 ⊆ hs1)))
  bitr4i(∃(hs2,((hs2 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ⊆ hs2)∧ hs2 ⊆ hs1)), ∃(hs2 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ hs2 ∧ hs2 ⊆ hs1)), ∃(hs2,(hs2 ∈ c0 ∧(c1 ⊆ hs2 ∧ hs2 ⊆ hs1))))
  exbii(hs2, ((hs2 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ⊆ hs2)∧ hs2 ⊆ hs1), (hs2 ∈ c0 ∧(c1 ⊆ hs2 ∧ hs2 ⊆ hs1)))
  anass(hs2 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ hs2, hs2 ⊆ hs1)
  df-rex(hs2, c0, (c1 ⊆ hs2 ∧ hs2 ⊆ hs1))
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 })
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c({ hs0 ∈ P(c2)|({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ⋂ P(hs0))≠ ∅ })
  diff.hs1.c(((nei ` c0)` c1))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅))
  diff.hs0.c(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(P(c2))
  diff.hs0.w(({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ⋂ P(hs1))≠ ∅)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ⊆ s0 } ⋂ P(hs1)))
  diff.wss.s(s0, c1, hs2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs2.c(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
}
